title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 147: Featuring Mike Comrie
description:
On Tuesday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys first address the schedule change and why they are recording a day late and its for the obvious reasonâ€¦the Super Bowl. And once again, the Boston boys gloat in their glory as the Patriots are Super Bowl champions once again. The guys discuss the game and some crazy bets RA hit. The guys are then joined by Mike Comrie, who was apart of the West Coast Wagon Tour. Chiclets Correspondent Teddy Purcell also joined the interview as well. The guys finished up with some NHL news and touched on some trades.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
